name: WPFY Scroller
author: Akramul Hasan

sections.description:
This is a tiny but useful plugin to add a simple icon in website bottom area. When you will scroll down a while, this clickable icon will be visible and after click it will take you to the top of the page. You will have a settings page under Dashboard-> Settings -> WPFY Scroller. There you can customise your icon design.

  • No Extra library or script
  • Very lightweight
  • Customisable
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from the Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.0

*Initial Release

1.1

*Added new option to put icon and background colour on hover

short_description: This simple lightweight plugin will add a scroll top icon in bottom area of your page to enhance your user experience.
